titles.title: A bill to establish a demonstration program to explore effective practices to improve early detection and management of injuries indicative of potential abuse in infants under the age of 7 months, in order to prevent future cases of child abuse and related fatalities.
Early Detection to Stop Infant Abuse and Prevent Fatalities Act
Early Detection to Stop Infant Abuse and Prevent Fatalities Act
Early Detection to Stop Infant Abuse and Prevent Fatalities Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
